about_the_game:
LUNARDENS

Welcome to the mystical world of Lunardens, where ancient creatures born from lunar energy roam the ethereal landscapes. As a Lunar Tamer, you'll discover, bond with, and train these extraordinary beings known as Lunarkin. Each Lunarkin possesses unique abilities influenced by the phases of the moon, creating an ever-shifting tactical landscape.

Core Features:

  • Explore diverse moonscapes from crystalline forests to shadow valleys

  • Capture and train over 150 unique Lunarkin species

  • Master the Moon Phase Combat System™ where creature powers wax and wane with lunar cycles

  • Build and customize your team of six Lunarkin

  • Challenge other Tamers in strategic battles that test your mastery of lunar energies

  • Evolve your Lunarkin through special moonstone rituals

  • Join one of three prestigious Lunar Houses, each with their own specialized training methods

  • Compete in the Grand Lunar Championship to become the Supreme Lunar Tamer

Your journey begins under the eternal moon, where each Lunarkin you encounter tells a story of celestial magic. Will you master the arts of lunar taming and rise to become a legend in the moonlit realm?

The fate of the Lunardens awaits your touch. Step into a world where strategy meets mysticism, and every phase of the moon brings new possibilities for victory.

name: Lunarwardens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory

short_description: Master the arts of Lunar Taming. Build your team of Lunarkin - moonlight creatures - and guide them to victory. Use moon phases, evolve through rituals, join Lunar Houses. Battle rivals, climb ranks, and become Supreme Lunar Tamer in this strategic creature battler.
